Class Car

java.lang.Object
Car
public class Car extends Object
Class representing a Hybrid car which can move and select Fuel or Electric energy to move depending on its autonomy.
Author:
A. La Fauci De Leo

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) int
    battery
    The level of Fuel and battery.
    (package private) boolean
    canMove
    Boolean flag which indicates if the car can move or not.
    (package private) Node
    currentPosition
    The current position of the car which is Start by default.
    (package private) String
    currentUsing
    What the car uses to move.
    (package private) int
    fuel
    The level of Fuel and battery.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Method which allows the car to stop and not moving from the current position.

    • checkAutonomy

      public void checkAutonomy()
      Method which will check the Autonomy of the car and will determine which type of fuel to use.

    • consumption

      public void consumption​(Node nextNode)
      Method which simulates the consumption of Fuel or Battery depending on what the vehicle is using.
      If it is using Fuel it will reduce fuel by the distance between nodes.
      Parameters:
      nextNode - the node where the car is going to move

    • move

      public void move​(Node nextNode)
      Method which allows the car to move to a node
      Parameters:
      nextNode - the node where to move the car

    • move

      public void move​(List<Node> path)
      Variation of the Move method. Instead of a single Node it takes a List of nodes.
      It then loops through the list and moves into each node of the Path.
      Parameters:
      path - the list of nodes forming the path.

    • findRoute

      public void findRoute​(List<Node> nodeTypes)
      Method to find the route to refill the tank or battery when level are low.
      Parameters:
      nodeTypes - a list of nodes depending on what is needed

    • refuel

      public void refuel()
      Method which will simulate re-charging or re-fuelling the car.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Method which will override the current toString method to print the status of the car in a nicely formatted way
